A7RU.SI.summary: Keppel Infrastructure Trust is a listed business trust. The firm provides investors with the opportunity to invest in a large and well-diversified portfolio of core infrastructure assets located in jurisdictions with well-developed legal frameworks that support infrastructure investment. It aims to provide long-term, regular and sustainable distributions to its Unitholders. Keppel Infrastructure Trust was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Singapore.

I11.SI.summary: Renaissance United Limited operates as a developer, turnkey contractor, and investor in oil and gas, power, transportation, water and environment, and industrial infrastructure projects worldwide. Its infrastructure related activities cover areas, such as offshore platforms and support facilities, product loading and receiving terminals, import-export SPM systems, land and submarine pipelines, minimal field production systems, supply bases and terminals, gas conversion plants, fabrication facilities, and sea islands/transshipment terminals; and small to medium sized power plants, large power developments, sub-packages of IPP projects, repowering of existing plants, industrial estate and captive power plants, and transmission and distribution projects. The company's infrastructure related activities in water and environment field cover raw water collection system, treatment plants, pipelines and outfalls, storage reservoirs, distribution systems, waste treatment and recycling, air pollution and noise control, and environmental services; transportation fields cover ports, harbors, jetties, wharves, transshipment facilities, and toll roads and bridges; and industrial sector cover petrochemical, telecommunications, industrial park, and pulp and paper mill infrastructure, as well as bulk material handling, fertilizer plants, and military applications. It also engages in the distribution of gas to household, commercial, and industrial users; the development of residential real estate properties; acting as agents and distributors of semiconductor back-end equipment; the provision of consultancy services in semi-conductor industry; the investment securities trading; the warehousing business; and the manufacture, repairing, and dealership in electronic components. The company was formerly known as Ipco International Limited and changed its name to Renaissance United Limited in December 2018. Renaissance United Limited was founded in 1975 and is based in Singapore.
